metatags.sailthru.tags: Immigration, Unaccompanied Minors, Trump administration, Obama Administration, Jon Favreau, Zero tolerance, Family separation, Michelle Mark
metatags.title: Obama officials rushed to explain photos from 2014 that went viral showing locked-up immigrant children — and Trump's facilities look the same
metatags.og:description: Several 2014 photos of detained immigrant children resurfaced and went viral in May. Former Obama administration officials tried to explain the context behind the photos, which appeared to show migrant kids locked up in cages. Recent photos of Trump administration detainment centers look the same.
